entries.english: Singular: Njaragia (I speak), Waragia (you speak), Aragia (he/she speaks). Plural: Twaragia (we speak), Mwaragia (you speak), Maragia (they speak)

Singular: Nĩĩ njũkaga (I come), Nĩĩ nđĩraga (I cry), Nĩĩ nđĩaga (I eat), Nĩĩ njaragia (I speak), Nĩĩ ngenaga (I'm usually happy), Nĩĩ thekaga (I laugh), Nĩĩ thiaga (I go), Nĩĩ thomaga (I read). Plural: Nĩĩ tũkaga (we come), Nĩĩ tũrĩraga (we cry), Nĩĩ tũrĩaga (we eat), Nĩĩ twaragia (we speak), Nĩĩ tũkenaga (we're happy), Nĩĩ tũthekaga (we laugh), Nĩĩ tũthiaga (we go), Nĩĩ tũthomaga (we read), Nĩĩ tũanđĩkaga (we write)
